name: Diabolik 1: Inafferrabile Criminale
overview: This is "Elusive criminal", the first episode of the series dedicated to the adventures of the thief-gentleman created by the Giussani sisters. The game is a platformer with adventure elements. The engine is that of the game "Dylan Dog - The killers", which was released in stores before Simulmondo started with the newsstand series. Much of the graphics are quite good for the time and price-point, but the engine itself could be really slow.
